response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "medium", "At 19, youth can contribute to impulsive behavior but also offers potential for change and maturation."],
    ["Race/Ethnicity", "low", "Hispanic identity alone is not a strong criminogenic risk factor when other factors are considered."],
    ["Criminal History", "low", "One arrest with no conviction indicates minimal prior criminal behavior."],
    ["Physical Health (Height/Weight)", "low", "The physical metrics provided do not correlate with criminal risk."],
    ["Marital Status and Living Situation", "low", "Being married and living with a spouse provides social stability, which is protective."],
    ["Education", "medium", "Having a high school diploma is a basic educational level; not pursuing higher education may limit opportunities."],
    ["Employment History", "medium", "Holding two jobs during the year suggests some degree of stable labor but may indicate economic stress if jobs are unstable."],
    ["Substance Use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years suggests low risk from substance abuse."],
    ["Mental Health", "medium", "Experiencing episodes of feeling down can be a risk factor if it affects behavior, though it is not extreme."],
    ["Family/Childhood Environment", "medium", "Growing up in a larger, urban household may involve exposure to varied environments, with both protective and risk elements."],
    ["Religious Beliefs", "low", "Attributing personal events to God can provide moral guidance and emotional support, thereby reducing risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: At 19, youth can contribute to impulsive behavior but also offers potential for change and maturation.
Hispanic identity alone is not a strong criminogenic risk factor when other factors are considered.
One arrest with no conviction indicates minimal prior criminal behavior.
The physical metrics provided do not correlate with criminal risk.
Being married and living with a spouse provides social stability, which is protective.
Having a high school diploma is a basic educational level; not pursuing higher education may limit opportunities.
Holding two jobs during the year suggests some degree of stable labor but may indicate economic stress if jobs are unstable.
No drug use in the past four years suggests low risk from substance abuse.
Experiencing episodes of feeling down can be a risk factor if it affects behavior, though it is not extreme.
Growing up in a larger, urban household may involve exposure to varied environments, with both protective and risk elements.
Attributing personal events to God can provide moral guidance and emotional support, thereby reducing risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 9 inches and weighs 137 lbs. He is married and is currently living with his spouse. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
